row.justified: In addition of being a programmer, I am a professional rally driver and not a bad one either. My most recent achievement was finishing second overall at European Rally Championship event Rally Liepaja. If at first it might seem that rally driving isn’t something that might help my career in IT, then I believe that the experience being in though and unfamiliar environments is something that will help me in IT as well. Furthermore, a big part of rally driving is teamwork, which is something that is crucial in IT. I’m sure that the success in rallying is something that will reflect my future as a programmer.

row.hyperlink: Suurepärast kiirust näidanud Siim Plangi lõpetas ERC-ralli teise kohaga
Siim Plangi stardib auto24 Rally Estonial Peugeot Sport meeskonna Peugeot 208 R5 autoga
